name: Pure Clean Daily Facial Cleanser
about: What it is:.What it is formulated to do:.What it is formulated WITHOUT:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Aluminum Zirconium Tetrachlorohydrate, PPG-14 Butyl Ether, Stearyl Alcohol, Glycine, Dimethicone, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Aqua, Parfum, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Tocopheryl Acetate, Silica, Steareth-100, Behenyl Alcohol, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Coumarin, Hydroxycitronellal, Geraniol, Limonene. 20036
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..-Apply a small amount to moist skin and work into a lather. ..-Rinse. ..-Use morning and night to cleanse skin..... Precautions:..-For external use only. ..-Avoid eye contact. If product enters eyes, rinse with water.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My boyfriend loves this cleanser so he decides to get the big size this time. He said it leaves his faces feeling very soft and not dry at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: my first ever Cleanser, and it's lovely. I've used this for 5 years and it's never let me down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my boyfriend and he loves it! Great scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My husband and I are both very big fans of this cleanser. It feels so nice and smooth going on and it doesn’t leave your skin dry. Also, there is no burning of the skin. I would totally recommend this product to both men and women.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for the first time in a sample box and I loved so much that I keep buying it now everytime I run out. My face feels really good after washing my face. I use it mostly before going to bed and I love the scent that leaves in my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the 6oz. bottle for my hubbs to try out. He loved it so much, when he ran out, he asked me to get him some more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Meh!! Save your money. I need to stop buying stuff off here. These reviews sucker you in. So disappointed in the product and brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Simply amazing. I used to use all those gentle cleansers people rave about, but this is absolutely different level. It’s gentle, but cleanses very nicely, so there are no traces of the makeup removing oil. It doesn’t dry your skin, but still perfectly does it’s job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. Really feel like it gets all the dirt off your face at the end of the day. Leaves your face feeling smooth and refreshed.

reviews.review_title: This product turned my boyfriend into a believer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been trying to get my boyfriend to properly care for his skin since forever but he was a strict, “the bar of soap that washes my body washes my face” kind of guy... well no more!  I bought him this cleanser and the face moisturizer as a gift and he absolutely fell in love with it and uses them both daily.  He works landscaping and construction so this really helps get in his pores and facial hair and removes all the excess sweat dead skin and grime from work and smells incredible.  He tried to pretend he didn’t love it as much as he does until it started to run out and asked for more.  The smell is great and it works incredibly we even fight over it while on vacation!

reviews.review_title: Husband added to his daily routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My husband is one of those easy care guys. He does the basic: soap, shampoo, deodorant. Then because is shaves his head (no hair left), I encouraged him to add sunscreen everyday in the morning, on face, neck and head. He  has very light skin. When I bought this cleanser for him, I didn't think he would go for it, but as he started using it, he never went back. Now this. little lives in the shower and it has been replaced over and over again for new ones once it runs out. The smell is light and not noticeable much on the skin. I recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love! My boyfriend used this and now I’m obsessed with Jack black products. If I didn’t wear make up this is the cleanser I use. It feels gentle yet still cleansing enough your face feels clean after. RECOMMEND FOR ANYONE. ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Meh!! Save your money. I need to stop buying stuff off here. These reviews sucker you in. So disappointed in the product and brand.
